2PM

Introduction

Jun. K is a South Korean singer-songwriter, rapper and actor under JYP Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group 2PM. They made their formal debut with the single album "Hottest Time of the Day" on September 4, 2008, after initially consisting of seven members.

He made his solo debut on October 7, 2011 with the single 'Alive' and in Japan in 2014 with the mini-album 'LOVE & HATE'.

On May 7, 2018, Jun.K joined the military as an active duty soldier. On January 2, 2020, he was formally released.

He had his first solo international concert on the year 2017 which was named "Mr. NO♡".
